definition: canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn

sentences.english: And one of my uncles left his wedding party in order to play in a cup game.
sentences.chinese: 我的一个叔叔为了杯赛离开了他的结婚典礼。

sentences.english: What's the best thing to say to the newlyweds at the wedding ceremony?
sentences.chinese: 结婚典礼的时候，要和新郎新娘说什么好呢？

sentences.english: Americans are not the only ones talking about the royal occasion.
sentences.chinese: 在谈论王室婚典的不仅仅是美国人。

sentences.english: But many ceremonies share common customs.
sentences.chinese: 而许多婚典有着共同的习俗。

sentences.english: Many couples ask for special music at their weddings.
sentences.chinese: 许多夫妇要求在他们的婚典上播放特别的音乐。

sentences.english: The heavy expenses involved in his marriage celebration cancelled out the possible pleasure he'd have.
sentences.chinese: 他的结婚典礼的巨大开销抵消了他可能得到的愉快。

sentences.english: At first glance, the half-dozen cars could pass for a wedding procession.
sentences.chinese: 乍眼瞅，这六辆小车可称得上一列婚典步队了。

sentences.english: Wedding celebration in a cafe nearby.
sentences.chinese: 附近一家咖啡厅里的结婚典礼。

sentences.english: They can study where to take their trip after the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 他们可以决定婚典后到哪里去旅行。

definition: (of the groom's family) to send a bridal sedan chair 花轎|花轿 to fetch the bride/to send a party to escort the bride to the groom's house
